title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Basic economy on American will no longer earn miles or Loyalty Points, a blow to AAdvantage members
items.description: American Airlines just added a new restriction to basic economy: Its flyers won't earn miles or Loyalty Points on no-frills tickets.

items.title: IHG is targeting select members with a compelling offer to buy elite qualifying points
items.description: IHG is offering select members a targeted offer to buy elite qualifying points toward higher elite status tiers. Here's why you should consider this o...

items.title: Southwest adds Turkish Airlines as sixth international partner
items.description: Southwest Airlines is partnering with Istanbul-based Turkish Airlines in its latest international partnership.

items.title: Current Chase Sapphire Preferred offer: Earn 75,000 points, worth over $1,500 in travel
items.description: The Chase Sapphire Preferred Card offers a valuable welcome bonus that can be maximized by transferring your points to one of 13 airline and hotel par...

items.title: 4 reasons to hold both the American Express Gold and Platinum
items.description: Debating if you should apply for the Amex Platinum or Gold card? Both can boost your American Express points balance and elevate your lifestyle.
